00044         public static void SaveFile(string Content, string FileName)
00045         {
00046             FileStream Writer = null;
00047             try
00048             {
00049                 byte[] ContentBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(Content);
00050                 int Index = FileName.LastIndexOf('/');
00051                 if (Index <= 0)
00052                 {
00053                     Index = FileName.LastIndexOf('\\');
00054                 }
00055                 if (Index <= 0)
00056                 {
00057                     throw new Exception("Directory must be specified for the file");
00058                 }
00059                 string Directory = FileName.Remove(Index) + "/";
00060                 if (!DirectoryExists(Directory))
00061                 {
00062                     CreateDirectory(Directory);
00063                 }
00064                 bool Opened = false;
00065                 while (!Opened)
00066                 {
00067                     try
00068                     {
00069                         Writer = File.Open(FileName, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None);
00070                         Opened = true;
00071                     }
00072                     catch (System.IO.IOException e)
00073                     {
00074                         throw e;
00075                     }
00076                 }
00077                 Writer.Write(ContentBytes, 0, ContentBytes.Length);
00078                 Writer.Close();
00079             }
00080             catch (Exception a)
00081             {
00082                 throw a;
00083             }
00084             finally
00085             {
00086                 if (Writer != null)
00087                 {
00088                     Writer.Close();
00089                     Writer.Dispose();
00090                 }
00091             }
00092         }

00311         public static string GetFileContents(string FileName, int TimeOut)
00312         {
00313             StreamReader Reader = null;
00314             int StartTime = System.Environment.TickCount;
00315             try
00316             {
00317                 if (!FileExists(FileName))
00318                     return "";
00319                 bool Opened = false;
00320                 while (!Opened)
00321                 {
00322                     try
00323                     {
00324                         if (System.Environment.TickCount - StartTime >= TimeOut)
00325                             throw new System.IO.IOException("File opening timed out");
00326                         Reader = File.OpenText(FileName);
00327                         Opened = true;
00328                     }
00329                     catch (System.IO.IOException e)
00330                     {
00331                         throw e;
00332                     }
00333                 }
00334                 string Contents = Reader.ReadToEnd();
00335                 Reader.Close();
00336                 return Contents;
00337             }
00338             catch
00339             {
00340                 return "";
00341             }
00342             finally
00343             {
00344                 if (Reader != null)
00345                 {
00346                     Reader.Close();
00347                     Reader.Dispose();
00348                 }
00349             }

00358         public static void GetFileContents(string FileName, out byte[]Output, int TimeOut)
00359         {
00360             FileStream Reader = null;
00361             MemoryStream TempReader=null;
00362             int StartTime = System.Environment.TickCount;
00363             try
00364             {
00365                 if (!FileExists(FileName))
00366                 {
00367                     Output = null;
00368                     return;
00369                 }
00370                 bool Opened = false;
00371                 while (!Opened)
00372                 {
00373                     try
00374                     {
00375                         if (System.Environment.TickCount - StartTime >= TimeOut)
00376                             throw new System.IO.IOException("File opening timed out");
00377                         Reader = File.OpenRead(FileName);
00378                         Opened = true;
00379                     }
00380                     catch (System.IO.IOException e)
00381                     {
00382                         throw e;
00383                     }
00384                 }
00385                 byte[] Buffer = new byte[1024];
00386                 TempReader=new MemoryStream();
00387                 while(Reader.Read(Buffer,0,1024)==1024)
00388                 {
00389                     TempReader.Write(Buffer,0,Buffer.Length);
00390                 }
00391                 Reader.Close();
00392                 Output=TempReader.ToArray();
00393                 TempReader.Close();
00394             }
00395             catch
00396             {
00397                 Output = null;
00398                 return;
00399             }
00400             finally
00401             {
00402                 if (Reader != null)
00403                 {
00404                     Reader.Close();
00405                     Reader.Dispose();
00406                 }
00407                 if (TempReader != null)
00408                 {
00409                     TempReader.Close();
00410                     TempReader.Dispose();
00411                 }
00412             }

00548         public static void CopyDirectory(string Source, string Destination, bool Recursive,CopyOptions Options)
00549         {
00550             try
00551             {
00552                 DirectoryInfo SourceInfo = new DirectoryInfo(Source);
00553                 DirectoryInfo DestinationInfo = new DirectoryInfo(Destination);
00554                 if (!DirectoryExists(Destination))
00555                 {
00556                     CreateDirectory(Destination);
00557                 }
00558                 List<FileInfo> Files = FileList(Source);
00559                 foreach (FileInfo File in Files)
00560                 {
00561                     if (Options == CopyOptions.CopyAlways)
00562                     {
00563                         File.CopyTo(Path.Combine(DestinationInfo.FullName, File.Name), true);
00564                     }
00565                     else if (Options == CopyOptions.CopyIfNewer)
00566                     {
00567                         if (FileExists(Path.Combine(DestinationInfo.FullName, File.Name)))
00568                         {
00569                             FileInfo FileInfo = new FileInfo(Path.Combine(DestinationInfo.FullName, File.Name));
00570                             if (FileInfo.LastWriteTime.CompareTo(File.LastWriteTime) < 0)
00571                             {
00572                                 File.CopyTo(Path.Combine(DestinationInfo.FullName, File.Name), true);
00573                             }
00574                         }
00575                         else
00576                         {
00577                             File.CopyTo(Path.Combine(DestinationInfo.FullName, File.Name), true);
00578                         }
00579                     }
00580                     else if (Options == CopyOptions.DoNotOverwrite)
00581                     {
00582                         File.CopyTo(Path.Combine(DestinationInfo.FullName, File.Name), false);
00583                     }
00584                 }
00585                 if (Recursive)
00586                 {
00587                     List<DirectoryInfo> Directories = DirectoryList(SourceInfo.FullName);
00588                     foreach (DirectoryInfo Directory in Directories)
00589                     {
00590                         CopyDirectory(Directory.FullName, Path.Combine(DestinationInfo.FullName, Directory.Name), Recursive, Options);
00591                     }
00592                 }
00593             }
00594             catch (Exception a)
00595             {
00596                 throw a;
00597             }
00598         }

00710         public static void SaveFile(string Content, string FileName, Uri FTPServer, string UserName, string Password)
00711         {
00712             try
00713             {
00714                 Uri TempURI = new Uri(Path.Combine(FTPServer.ToString(), FileName));
00715                 FtpWebRequest FTPRequest = (FtpWebRequest)FtpWebRequest.Create(TempURI);
00716                 FTPRequest.Credentials = new NetworkCredential(UserName, Password);
00717                 FTPRequest.KeepAlive = false;
00718                 FTPRequest.Method = WebRequestMethods.Ftp.UploadFile;
00719                 FTPRequest.UseBinary = true;
00720                 FTPRequest.ContentLength = Content.Length;
00721                 FTPRequest.Proxy = null;
00722                 using (Stream TempStream = FTPRequest.GetRequestStream())
00723                 {
00724                     System.Text.ASCIIEncoding TempEncoding = new System.Text.ASCIIEncoding();
00725                     byte[] TempBytes = TempEncoding.GetBytes(Content);
00726                     TempStream.Write(TempBytes, 0, TempBytes.Length);
00727                 }
00728                 FTPRequest.GetResponse();
00729             }
00730             catch { }
00731         }
